name: SnowManNight(official)
description:
SnowManNight is fanGame of fnaf planned for christmas , you are trapped in your nightmare the night of christmas eve so you must survive until your wake up will you be able to resist until then?

game made with click team fusion 2.5

design, model, render stuff made with Blender 3d

audios and sounds : youtube and freesound.org
